definition: an extravagantly enthusiastic review, praise enthusiastically
details:
noun
- an extravagantly enthusiastic review
= example: an extravagantly enthusiastic review
- a dance party that lasts all night and electronically synthesized music is played
= example: a dance party that lasts all night and electronically synthesized music is played
verb
- praise enthusiastically
= example: praise enthusiastically
= synonyms: gush
- talk in a noisy, excited, or declamatory manner
= synonyms: spout
- participate in an all-night techno dance party
